channel.title: Poetries on Garrett Massman
channel.description: Recent content in Poetries on Garrett Massman

item.title: My Mantra
item.description: Life is beautiful Listen to music Play, Grow Work hard, work out Eat healthy Learn from others Be gracious Love is out there

item.title: While True
item.description: I haven't done so and such in a little while What's a once in a while that is any more than a little? It must be a long while, longer than the littlest little while A cardinality all its own, an infinity of sorts Discovered once a moment Infinitesimally summed across a minute Integral to all we've been through All we'll be through All we'll be In obsession comes regression From the short engaged the long Here's a section unimpressioned Here's a fraction never wrong What is written to and from here Where it's leading, where it's been Which arrangement it's preceding Why it's designed just to win
